title: Secure User Registration
description: As a new user, I want to register securely using my personal information and identity verification, so that I can create a verified banking account.
attributes_and_rules: User must provide all mandatory KYC documents. Registration data must be encrypted during transmission and storage.
acceptance_criteria: User can input registration details and upload documents
Identity verification is validated before account creation
Registration confirmation is sent upon successful completion
test_cases: Given a new user, When they complete registration with valid details, Then the system creates the user account and triggers KYC verification

title: Multi-Factor Authentication for Login
description: As a registered user, I want to securely log in using multi-factor authentication, so that I can protect my account access.
attributes_and_rules: System must support password + OTP or biometric authentication; sessions should expire after inactivity.
acceptance_criteria: Login requires username/password and OTP verification
Session tokens expire after defined inactivity period
System blocks access after multiple failed attempts
test_cases: Given a valid user, When they log in with correct credentials and OTP, Then the system grants access
Given multiple invalid login attempts, When threshold exceeded, Then account access is temporarily locked

title: Edit Personal and Contact Information
description: As a customer, I want to update my personal and contact details, so that my profile remains accurate and up to date.
attributes_and_rules: Sensitive updates require identity verification; audit history must log all edits.
acceptance_criteria: User can view and edit name, address, phone, and email
System requests OTP verification for key updates
Audit log captures each edit with timestamp and user ID
test_cases: Given a user, When they edit their phone number, Then system sends OTP for update verification
Given a successful update, When audit is queried, Then change details are visible

title: Display Consolidated Account Overview
description: As a customer, I want to view all my accounts and balances in one dashboard, so that I can easily monitor my financial status.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard must display balances securely and be accessible across devices.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows all linked accounts and balances
Account numbers are partially masked for privacy
Responsive design ensures usability on all devices
test_cases: Given multiple accounts, When dashboard is loaded, Then all balances are shown with masked account numbers
Given a mobile device, When accessing dashboard, Then layout adjusts responsively

title: Perform Domestic and International Transfers
description: As a customer, I want to transfer funds between my accounts and to others domestically or internationally, so that I can conveniently handle payments.
attributes_and_rules: All transfers must comply with AML and transaction limit regulations.
acceptance_criteria: User can initiate intra-bank, inter-bank, and international transfers
System validates AML rules before processing
Transfer status updates are sent in real time
test_cases: Given a valid domestic beneficiary, When user initiates transfer, Then transaction completes successfully and status is updated
Given an AML breach, When transfer is initiated, Then system rejects transaction

title: Pay Recurring and One-Time Bills
description: As a customer, I want to pay my utility and credit card bills, so that I can manage recurring payments easily.
attributes_and_rules: User must be able to add billers, schedule or pay instantly, and view payment history.
acceptance_criteria: User can link and manage multiple billers
Recurring payment schedules can be set and edited
Instant confirmation receipt is displayed for payments
test_cases: Given a biller linked, When user makes instant payment, Then system generates confirmation receipt
Given a recurring schedule, When due date arrives, Then system auto-initiates payment

title: View and Download Transaction History
description: As a user, I want to access transaction history and download account statements, so that I can keep records for reference.
attributes_and_rules: Users must be able to filter by date/type and download in supported formats.
acceptance_criteria: Transactions can be filtered by date, type, and amount
Statements downloadable in PDF, CSV, or XLS formats
Delivery option available via email or notification
test_cases: Given past transactions, When user filters by date, Then system displays matching records
Given a statement request, When user selects PDF, Then file downloads successfully

title: Manage Debit and Credit Cards
description: As a customer, I want to manage my debit and credit cards, so that I can control usage and security.
attributes_and_rules: User must be able to view, freeze/unfreeze, and set transaction limits on cards.
acceptance_criteria: User can view active cards and last transactions
Card can be temporarily suspended or reactivated
Transaction limits can be modified and saved
test_cases: Given an active card, When user suspends it, Then card status updates to inactive
Given a limit change, When saved, Then system applies new limit immediately

title: Apply for and Manage Loans
description: As a customer, I want to apply for loans and track their progress, so that I can manage my credit effectively.
attributes_and_rules: Eligibility and document uploads must be verified before approval.
acceptance_criteria: User can select loan type and view eligibility result
Documents can be uploaded securely for verification
Loan status updates are viewable post-submission
test_cases: Given eligible customer, When loan application submitted with complete documents, Then system triggers review process
Given under review status, When decision ready, Then update shown in app

title: Receive Real-Time Account Notifications
description: As a customer, I want to receive real-time alerts for transactions and security events, so that I can stay informed about my account activity.
attributes_and_rules: User preferences control channels and frequency for notifications.
acceptance_criteria: User receives alerts for all transactions and login events
Preferences can be set for SMS, email, or push notification
System differentiates normal and high-risk alerts
test_cases: Given a transaction, When completed, Then system sends notification as per user preference
Given new device login, When detected, Then user receives security alert

title: Monitor and Detect Fraudulent Activities
description: As a security officer, I want to monitor and detect fraudulent activities in real time, so that I can protect customers and the institution.
attributes_and_rules: AI and rule-based detection algorithms should evaluate transactions continuously.
acceptance_criteria: System performs continuous fraud checks on transactions
High-risk transactions are flagged for manual review
Security rules can be updated dynamically
test_cases: Given a suspicious transaction, When detected by engine, Then flag is raised for review
Given a rule update, When applied, Then monitoring logic reflects new condition

title: Provide Personalized Financial Insights
description: As a customer, I want to receive insights into my spending and saving trends, so that I can improve financial planning.
attributes_and_rules: System should analyze spending data and suggest saving/investment opportunities.
acceptance_criteria: Insights are generated from categorized transaction data
Graphs show monthly trends for income and expenses
Recommendations are personalized based on behavior
test_cases: Given complete transaction history, When analyzed, Then system generates spending summary graph
Given a user with surplus funds, When insights calculated, Then recommendation for savings product displayed

title: Provide AI-Driven Customer Chat Support
description: As a customer, I want to interact with an intelligent chatbot for my queries, so that I can get instant assistance or connect to support agents.
attributes_and_rules: Chatbot handles FAQs; unresolved issues escalate to human support.
acceptance_criteria: User can ask common questions and receive instant replies
Chatbot creates ticket for unresolved queries
System supports live agent transfer and ticket tracking
test_cases: Given a user question, When chatbot matches FAQ, Then answer is returned instantly
Given an unresolved issue, When user requests support, Then ticket created and assigned
